content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened" )
( ing-1 "1/2 cup butter, softened" )
( ing-2 "2 cups all-purpose flour" )
( ing-3 "1 cup white sugar" )
( ing-4 "1/3 cup milk" )
( ing-5 "1/2 pound ground walnuts" )
( ing-6 "1/3 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration" )

content.text: 0) Beat together cream cheese and margarine until well blended.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Beat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "cream cheese"@17:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "margarine"@34:43 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until well blended"@44:62 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "flour"@7:12 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:simultaneous ( ac-1-1 "mixing"@14:20 / AC )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Shape into a ball, cover and chill for 2 hours.
3) In saucepan over medium heat, cook sugar and milk, stirring occasionally until milk boils and sugar is dissolved.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "cook"@33:37 / AC
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "saucepan"@6:14 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-3-0 "medium heat"@20:31 / TEMPERATURE )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "sugar"@38:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "milk"@48:52 / FOOD )
		:simultaneous ( ac-3-1 "stirring"@54:62 / AC
			:until ( cond-3-0 "until milk boils and sugar is dissolved"@76:115 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		)
	)
)

content.text: 5) Remove from heat and let cool until mixture is of spreading consistency.
6) Roll out chilled dough on lightly floured surface to a rectangle about 18 X 12 inches.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Roll out"@3:11 / AC
		:ppt ( "chilled dough"@12:25 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "lightly floured surface"@29:52 / TOOL )
		:reshape ( "a rectangle about 18 X 12 inches"@56:88 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Spread each piece with milk/nut filling and roll up like a jelly-roll, starting from the long side.
10) Place seam side down on ungreased cookie sheets (two on a baking sheet).
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Place"@4:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "seam side"@10:19 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-10-0 "ungreased cookie sheets"@28:51 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Leaving roll's shape intact, cut into slices 1/2 inch thick almost to the bottom of the roll.
content.eamr:
( inst-11 / R
	:inform ( "Leaving roll's shape intact"@4:31 / OTHER )
	:inform ( ac-11-0 "cut"@33:36 / AC
		:reshape ( "slices 1/2 inch thick"@42:63 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 12) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 15 to 20 minutes or till done.
content.eamr:
( inst-12 / R
	:inform ( ac-12-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-12-0 "350 degrees F"@12:25 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-12-1 "175 degrees C"@27:40 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-12-0 "15 to 20 minutes"@46:62 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-12-0 "till done"@66:75 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 13) Remove from sheet and sprinkle with confectioners' sugar.
15) Cut cookies all the way through.
17) Resprinkle with confectioners' sugar before serving.
content.eamr:
( inst-17 / R
	:inform ( ac-17-0 "Resprinkle"@4:14 / AC
		:ppt ( "confectioners' sugar"@20:40 / FOOD )
		:duration ( cond-17-0 "before serving"@41:55 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
